name: sistema-de-riesgos
description: Sistema de Gesti√≥n de Riesgos LGI-FT-FPADM
author: Yann Klever Inca

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run build-frontend && electron-builder build --dir
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run build-frontend && electron-builder build --dir
scripts.build:obfuscated: npm run build-frontend && npm run obfuscate && electron-builder build --publish=never --dir
scripts.dist:obfuscated: npm run build-frontend && npm run obfuscate && electron-builder build --publish=never --win
